nodes.text: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story - The Official Mission Debrief

Rogue One: A Star Wars Story - The Official Mission Debrief, colloquially known as Rogue One: Mission Debrief, is a hardcover magazine that features behind-the-scenes images and interviews from the 2016 film Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. The issue was published on March 28, 2017 by Titan Magazines.

You've finally experienced Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. Now, go behind-the-scenes for an in-depth look at the making of this blockbuster prequel to Episode IV: A New Hope with tons of color photos and exclusive interviews with the cast, crew and creators behind one of 2016's most eagerly anticipated movie events!
The printing credits for Rogue One: Mission Debrief erroneously list the ISBN for Rogue One: A Star Wars Story - The Official Collector's Edition, which was also published by Titan Magazines.
